reporter_caption.center: POTOMAC INSURANCE COMPANY v. McINTOSH, 168 Ariz. 156 (1991)

caption.center: POTOMAC INSURANCE COMPANY, a foreign insurance company authorized to do
business in Arizona, and Shand-Morahan Company, its managing underwriters,
Plaintiffs/Appellees, v. Frank D. McINTOSH; Donald McIntosh and Webster

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER
ORDERED: Vacating the order granting review in this matter as having been improvidently granted.
FURTHER ORDERED: Petition for Review DENIED.
